thread.title: People Are Thanking Constance Wu For Speaking Out Against Casey Affleck's Oscar Nomination
thread.title_full: People Are Thanking Constance Wu For Speaking Out Against Casey Affleck's Oscar Nomination

author: Kassy Cho
title: People Are Thanking Constance Wu For Speaking Out Against Casey Affleck's Oscar Nomination
text:
She also called on the awarding committee to recognize the role it plays in recognizing the nominees’ actions. ID: 10393243 7. Wu concludes by saying that although she has been told not to speak about this “for career’s sake”, she did it because she’s “a woman and human first.” I've been counseled not to talk about this for career's sake. F my career then, I'm a woman & human first. That's what my craft is built on.
— Constance Wu (@ConstanceWu) ID: 10393247 8. People are now thanking her for speaking out. @ConstanceWu Yaaaas. Thank you for speaking out! Means a lot to so many ppl who don't have the platform.
— Phoebe Robinson (@dopequeenpheebs) ID: 10393780 View this image ›
Twitter: @Becerra_ad ID: 10393799 @ConstanceWu
— Emma Gray (@emmaladyrose) ID: 10393786 11. Some said they were blown away by her courage. @ConstanceWu I am always blown away by your courage, Constance! Keep on keeping on!
— 202-224-3121Congress (@monkeypox0104) ID: 10393851 View this image ›
Twitter: @AliPitargoo ID: 10393796 View this image ›
Twitter: @MikeJBknows ID: 10393792 14. And many are voicing their support for her and standing with her. View this image ›
Twitter: @NellSco ID: 10393785 View this image ›
Twitter: @VictoriaChalk ID: 10393808 View this image ›
Twitter: @maxzenemarie ID: 10393803 17. BuzzFeed News has reached out to Constance Wu’s representatives for comment. ID: 10394123
